nodes.label: Supabase (SoR)
nodes.description: Fonte transacional canônica com auth, RLS e contratos RPC api_syn_*_v1.

nodes.label: Syn Middleware
nodes.description: Orquestra ingestão semântica, aplica guardrails e expõe endpoint de summary.

nodes.label: ClickHouse
nodes.description: Camada de performance para sinais semânticos e sumarização executiva.

nodes.label: mapa-app /syn
nodes.description: Consome RPCs Syn e summary semântico para vistas de leads, heatmap, outreach e setor.

nodes.label: Contratos PAT-SYN
nodes.description: SSOT com regras de binding, taxonomia de sinais e evolução versionada.

dataArchitecture.mermaid:
flowchart LR
  SB["Supabase SoR"] -->|"canonical_events + source_contract"| MW["Syn Middleware"]
  MW -->|"semantic_signals_v2 / semantic_chunks_v2"| CH["ClickHouse"]
  CH -->|"semantic_signals_summary_v1"| MW
  SB -->|"api_syn_*_v1"| APP["mapa-app /syn"]
  MW -->|"/api/syn/semantic-signals-summary"| APP
  CT["PAT-SYN Contracts"] --> APP
  CT --> MW
dataArchitecture.mermaidVertical:
flowchart TB
  SB["Supabase SoR"] -->|"canonical_events + source_contract"| MW["Syn Middleware"]
  MW -->|"semantic_signals_v2 / semantic_chunks_v2"| CH["ClickHouse"]
  CH -->|"semantic_signals_summary_v1"| MW
  SB -->|"api_syn_*_v1"| APP["mapa-app /syn"]
  MW -->|"/api/syn/semantic-signals-summary"| APP
  CT["PAT-SYN Contracts"] --> APP
  CT --> MW

sankey-beta
Supabase SoR,Syn Middleware,100

Semantic Summary,mapa-app syn,54

PAT-SYN Contracts,Syn Middleware,28
PAT-SYN Contracts,mapa-app syn,30

appDataArchitecture.mermaid:
flowchart LR
  subgraph UI["UI Views"]
    V0["/syn\nLeads & Insights"]
    V1["/syn/heatmap\nStrategic Heatmap"]
    V2["/syn/outreach\nOutreach IA"]
    V3["/syn/sector\nAnálise Setorial"]
    V4["/syn/sector\nResumo Semântico"]
  end
  subgraph API["Chamadas / Endpoints"]
    E0["api_syn_leads_v1"]
    E1["api_syn_heatmap_v1"]
    E2["api_syn_outreach_v1"]
    E3["api_syn_sector_v1"]
    E4["/api/syn/semantic-signals-summary"]
  end
  subgraph DATA["Dados e Serviços"]
    SB["Supabase SoR"]
    MW["Syn Middleware"]
    CH["ClickHouse Summary"]
    IDM["Idempotent Summary Read"]
  end
  CT1["PAT-SYN-RPC-001"]
  CT2["PAT-SYN-SOURCE-001"]
  V0 --> E0
  V1 --> E1
  V2 --> E2
  V3 --> E3
  V4 --> E4
  E0 -->|"RPC authenticated"| SB
  CT1 --> E0
  E1 -->|"RPC authenticated"| SB
  CT1 --> E1
  E2 -->|"RPC authenticated"| SB
  CT1 --> E2
  E3 -->|"RPC authenticated"| SB
  CT1 --> E3
  E4 -->|"HTTP GET idempotente"| MW
  CT2 --> E4
  MW --> IDM
  IDM --> CH
  CH --> IDM
  IDM --> MW

    IDM["Idempotent Summary Read"]
  end
  CT1["PAT-SYN-RPC-001"]

  V2 --> E2
  V3 --> E3
  V4 --> E4
  E0 -->|"RPC authenticated"| SB

  MW --> IDM

  CH --> IDM

executivePillars.title: Autoridade do Dado
executivePillars.description: Supabase mantém a verdade transacional e contratos RPC com governança explícita.

executivePillars.title: Runtime Semântico
executivePillars.description: Middleware Syn opera como camada crítica para summary e precisa monitoria de disponibilidade.

executivePillars.title: Conformidade de Contratos
executivePillars.description: Bindings UI↔dados dependem de aderência PAT-SYN e validação pós-migration sem drift.
